backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor that generates test suites from requirements, creating functional, boundary, edge case, exploratory, positive, and negative test cases with structured steps, preconditions, and expected results.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder with no documented features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing the test case generator application architecture, components, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode themes, including custom color variables for test categories and UI components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Test Case Generator application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup defining root layout route and index route pointing to GeneratorPage component.
frontend/src/components/FileUpload.tsx: File upload component with drag-and-drop support, Word document validation, progress tracking, and integration with useFileUpload hook to process requirements.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Application layout with header containing branding, main content outlet for routing, and footer with attribution and caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/components/TestCaseCard.tsx: Card component displaying individual test case details including ID, type, title, preconditions, numbered steps, and expected results with category-specific color coding.
Main display component with tabbed navigation across test categories, summary statistics, and export buttons for copy, text download, and Excel export functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFileUpload.ts: Handles file upload logic for .doc/.docx files, validates file types, simulates upload progress, and parses text content to extract requirements (lines with sufficient length).
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context using AuthClient, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file kept for template consistency; main query logic is in useTestGeneration.ts.
frontend/src/hooks/useTestCaseExport.ts: Provides functions to format and export test suites as plain text, CSV, or downloadable files, with clipboard copy support and structured formatting for test cases.
frontend/src/hooks/useTestGeneration.ts: Manages test case generation by calling the backend actor's getTestSuite method with requirements, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, including professional color palettes for testing categories (functional, boundary, edge, exploratory, positive, negative).
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/GeneratorPage.tsx: Main page component managing the workflow states (upload, processing, results, error) for uploading requirement documents, generating test cases, and displaying results with reset functionality.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space (including testing category colors like functional, boundary, edge), container settings, border radius variables, and font families (Inter, JetBrains Mono).
project_state.json: Project state tracking document describing a test case generation app that parses Word documents to generate categorized test cases (functional, boundary, edge, exploratory, positive, negative) with Excel export capability; notes known issues with test case naming and step details.
